H0.text: where do the blood vessels that supply the retinal cells lie. Choroid

H1.text: where do the blood vessels that supply the retinal cells lie. Retinal pigment epithelium

H2.text: where do the blood vessels that supply the retinal cells lie. Macula

H3.text: where do the blood vessels that supply the retinal cells lie. optic nerve

A4.text: The choroid provides oxygen and nourishment to the outer layers of the retina.

A5.text: The retinal circulation derives primarily from the central retinal artery, which travels within the optic nerve.
